cont.entity_a: Solid build quality with superior fps and autofocus points. Built like a tank with a fast burst rate.
cont.entity_b: Camera in bad condition with missing settings indicator and side cover.

cont.entity_a: Low resolution with 4.2MP, but images can be interpolated. Low resolution is a drawback.
Pro autofocus, 8.3 FPS, and weather-sealed pro body. Fast autofocus with 45 points and AI SERVO MODE.
cont.entity_b: Issues with focus, flash, and busy signal.
Clear pictures and compatible with older lenses.

cont.entity_a: Not worth $2000 as time has passed it by.
cont.entity_b: Inexpensive, high-quality DSLR that is easy to use.

cont.entity_a: Image quality comparable to new point-and-shoot cameras.
cont.entity_b: Clean camera, operates well, and takes nice pictures. Clear pictures and compatible with older lenses.
Battery only holds charge for 2 minutes.

cont.entity_a: Error 99 encountered and difficulty in finding accessories.
cont.entity_b: Missing accessories that were supposed to be included. Good customer service with fast replacement of missing battery.

cont.entity_a: Usable photos at 1600 ISO despite old technology.
cont.entity_b: Camera is versatile with automatic and creative modes. Good for beginners with multiple lens options. Camera works well for photography class and general use. Fast picture-taking speed with no lag. Camera is easy to use with automatic features.
Received camera in good condition and as advertised. Camera arrived quickly and was shipped well.

cont.entity_a: Good as a backup camera due to speed.
cont.entity_b: Great starter camera with free online manual and editing software. Camera is versatile with automatic and creative modes. Good for beginners with multiple lens options.
Older model uses compact flash instead of SD card. Dust on lenses but exceeded expectations in performance.
